title: Champ select trolls
body:
HI the only reason im writing this is to see some justice

I went into a game of ranked and showed my team i planned to pick Anivia (im a one trick pony) and then the Adc asks if he can mid i said no so the support bans anivia and says he wants to fight me and murder me. these guys are in a 3 man premade the champions they picked were Blitzcrank, Lee sin and ezreal (match link: **[REMOVED]** ) at this point i would have dodged the game and taken the -3 lp but im in my promo to gold so i picked a random mid champ who i had experience with, Fizz (yes im a horrible person) and tried my hardest but these three every time i would make a mistake would flame extra hard at me saying stuff like your disabled and this is offensive as i do have a mental disability.

anyway i dont care about losing the match i just want a way to deal with champ select trolls who had no intention of working with you from the very start 

thank you

replies.body:
Riot will do nothing, they weren't in the wrong
~Sincerely, the only person interested in clean up the mess.

Dynamic queue, and basically there is nothing you can do aside from reporting them at the end of the game, and hell the link will be removed soon enough.

This is why playing ranked by yourself is ill advised.
